home.title: Train Routing System
home.subtitle: Complete train routing solution with optimized distance calculation and advanced statistical analysis
home.aboutSubtitle: A modern full-stack application for managing and analyzing railway routes
home.aboutText1: This project was developed as part of the {challenge} from {mob}. It is a complete application that allows calculating optimal routes between different railway stations using advanced routing algorithms.
home.aboutText2: The application offers an intuitive user interface to create routes between stations, visualize calculated journeys, and analyze aggregated statistics by analytic code. It also integrates a secure authentication system and a complete REST API for integration with other systems.

routeCalculation.title: Optimal route calculation
routeCalculation.description: Dijkstra algorithm to find the shortest path between two stations

analytics.title: Analytical statistics
analytics.description: Aggregated route analysis by analytic code with graphical visualizations

interface.title: Intuitive interface
interface.description: Modern and responsive design with interactive journey visualization

api.title: Complete REST API
api.description: OpenAPI 3.1 compliant API with integrated Swagger documentation

auth.title: Secure authentication
auth.description: JWT system for authentication and endpoint security

docker.title: Docker deployment
docker.description: Containerized infrastructure with Docker Compose for simplified deployment

home.techSubtitle: A modern architecture based on software development best practices

ddd.title: Domain-Driven Design
ddd.description: DDD-based architecture with clear separation between business domain, infrastructure and application. Business code is isolated from technical details.

tdd.title: Test-Driven Development
tdd.description: Test-driven development with ≥80% code coverage for backend and frontend. Complete unit and integration tests.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code & Standards
cleanCode.description: Strict compliance with PSR-12 standards for PHP, ESLint/Prettier for TypeScript, and static analysis with PHPStan level 8.

cicd.title: Automated CI/CD
cicd.description: Complete GitHub Actions pipeline with build, tests, linting, security scanning, and automatic deployment. Quality guaranteed at every commit.

home.mobText1: This project was carried out as part of the {challenge} from {mob}, demonstrating the application of modern software development best practices, software architecture, and continuous deployment.
home.mobText2: The application illustrates a professional approach to full-stack development, with clear separation of responsibilities, an evolutive architecture, and particular attention to code quality, tests, and security.
